Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time spent on Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR across all cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time taken for a case to move from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Request Payment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR and Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR before Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across variants where this transition occurs
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average time it takes from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Payment Handled in cases without Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases leading to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to the next activity in the most frequent variant
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and the end of case where activity 'next_activity occurs

Name: Total time it takes from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in the variant with the highest performance
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases successfully completed without rejections
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in cases that were rejected at least once before approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
